about_the_game:
Become the ultimate basketball general manager in Basketball Legacy Manager 25 (BBLM25)! Take control of a professional basketball team and create an enduring legacy. Experience the most immersive mobile basketball manager with features that let you dominate the league for decades!

🏀 THE ULTIMATE BASKETBALL GM EXPERIENCE 🏀
Manage every aspect of your team, from coaching and scouting to drafting and trading. Negotiate contracts and develop players to lead your team to victory.

📱 OFFLINE BASKETBALL MANAGER 📱
Play anytime, anywhere - no internet connection required! HLM25 lets you enjoy the excitement of managing your basketball team whenever you want.

⬆️ UNIQUE CAREER STORYLINES ⬆️
Follow the evolution of the entire league, witnessing teams rise from declining contenders to rising superstars. Track league records, draft classes, player transactions, and more!

🌐 FULLY CUSTOMIZABLE 🌐
Customize players, teams, coaches, and leagues! Take control of your basketball universe and shape its future with expansion drafts.

📅 START FROM 1951 📅
Begin your career from the early days of basketball and lead your team through the ages. Make strategic decisions and leave a lasting impact on the league's history.

NEW FEATURES
Basketball Legacy Manager 25 introduces exciting new features to enhance your basketball management experience:

🏅 Hall of Fame: Experience the prestige of the Hall of Fame with the new nomination and induction feature. Each team can nominate players based on their career achievements, and witness the celebration of hockey legends!

🎮 PROLONGED GAMING EXPERIENCE 🎮
With Basketball Legacy Manager PRO, you can play for decades and even centuries, experiencing the thrill of basketball management for ages!

🏀 Start your General Manager career now and leave your mark on the basketball world! Download Basketball Legacy Manager 25 today! 🏀

name: Basketball Legacy Manager 25

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 - 64 bit
  • Processor: 64-bit Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2GB GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 - 64 bit
  • Processor: 64-bit Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2GB GB available space

short_description: Build the ultimate legacy as the general manager of a professional basketball team!
